column4: according to a tutorial about firefox plugins, i'm supposed to install the package "w3codecs", but this package doesn't show up when searching in synaptic package manager. i've added a "universe" repository, but it still doesn't show up. what can i do?
follow the link ubotu gav now
am i supposed to copy the contents of the generated sources.list to /etc/apt/sources.list?
seems i can't open sources.list. the console just hangs when i do "sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list"
(gedit:8744): GnomeUI-WARNING **: While connecting to session manager:
now, what do i replace in this file?
what do you suggest i do to edit the sources.list file?
u do hav a separate source.list from the website dont u
